features: 【High Quality Seat Cushion】- HAVARGO office seat cushion made with high quality memory foam,if you spent 8hours or longer time on the chair every day, this chair cushion will provide enough support to your lumbar and lower back, it can help to improve your sitting posture,and providing stability and comfort during long periods of sitting

【Suitable for Any Chair】- With an universal size of 18"x14"x3",the desk chair cushion nicely fits most office chairs, school chairs, wheelchairs,gaming chairs, car seats & truck seats. And with a portable handle, you can also take it while traveling, and use it on a train or plane.

【Seat Cushion for Desk Chair】- The ideal ergonomic U-shaped Contoured Design of this desk seat cushion provides optimal pressure relief to our body, it offloading pressure on the spinal discs, it is a great cushion for office workers, students,seniors, truck drivers and people who is suffering from hemorrhoids.

【Wonderful Chair Pad】 -Covered with premium washable & breathable luxury cover, the pressure relief thick seat cushion can help to relieve back pain,sciatica,coccyx pain,butt stress and pregnancy work stress, and upgrade your long sitting experience. It is also a wonderful seat cushion for heavy people around 150-220lbs.

【Supportive & Quick Rebound Chair Cushion】- Premium supportive and quick rebound memory foam, the car seat booster cushion can maintain its shape and provides long-lasting comfort. Any more, HAVARGO chair cushions are shipped in a vacuum-compressed packaging. After unpacking it, please let it inflat naturally for 24-48 hour to its original shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for any back or tailbone pain!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is great! Super supportive and makes any chair more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Way To Add Support During Extended Periods Of Sitting
reviews.reviewText: As someone who spends a significant amount of time sitting, whether it's driving while making deliveries or using the computer for business or personal purposes, I have tried several different options to alleviate discomfort and improve posture. Unfortunately, most of these options have been ineffective, making it an ongoing and almost impossible task to find a comfortable solution. I had been looking for an item that could serve multiple purposes in one and make sitting more comfortable, which led me to request this cushion that seemed like the best option.However, upon receiving the cushion, I was disappointed with the packaging as it came in a plastic bag that looked more like a vacuum-sealed steak you would find in your freezer than a cushion. Nonetheless, I cut open the bag and allowed the cushion to decompress as instructed in the included paperwork. Although it stated waiting 24 hours, I decided to wait for an additional 24 hours to ensure that it was completely decompressed and would be effective in the long run.Once I tried the cushion, I could feel the difference right away, even after sitting for an extended period. I then decided to test it while driving, and although it made the drive more comfortable, it made me sit higher up, causing my head to hit the roof of the car, which was uncomfortable and unpleasant. Although it increased comfort while driving, I was unable to drive for long using it.To further test the cushion's effectiveness, I used it on an old wooden chair with no cushion, and it made sitting on the chair much more comfortable. The only drawback was that it slid around, and it would have been helpful to have some sort of strap or velcro to keep it in place.Overall, I found the cushion to be well worth the price, and I would highly recommend it to anyone who spends long periods sitting. It comes with a handle that makes it easy to carry, a removable case to keep it clean, and the durability to stand up to a hard wooden surface without any additional support. However, if you plan on using it while driving, I would recommend testing it while parked to avoid any potential issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this cushion for my dad to sit on in his wheelchair it helps him. He does not hurt as he used to. He says it's more comfortable than just sitting on the wheel chair seat or a regular pillow. I sat on the cushion and I also thought it was comfy I would order one for me to put in a regular chair to sit on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Full disclosure: I've never been a big fan of this type of cushion. For some reason they make me sit in a way that makes things hurt more than before. I blame this on blue-collar genetics in a white-collar job to tell the truth. My ancestors hoisted heavy things for a living and walked to work up hill both ways. I probably just wasn't meant to sit in a chair all day.With that out of the way, this particular cushion is better than others I've tried.It came in a small package and, once opened, had to be left out for 24 hours to fully unpack itself.My office chair isn't "terrible" but sometimes I just need to change sitting positions. That's where this cushion comes in for me. I'll set it up with the gap facing forward most of the time. After a few hours, I usually go back to just the bare chair. Not because the cushion is "bad" but because the chair feels better to me after spending some time on the cushion.I weigh a "tad" under 200 lbs and I feel like it's "mostly" compressed (though not quite completely - and still comfortable). If you weigh much more, you may not get much "cush" from this cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really comfortable and practical
reviews.reviewText: I like how comfortable it is, it helps me feel more relaxed when I have to sit and work for long periods of time, it is thick and soft, what I like is that it comes with a zipper to make it easier to wash the cover, Really lightweight and portable, so overall I think it's a good option to consider if you're looking for one, I recommend it.NOTE: I'm part of the VINE VOICE program and this will not affect or change in any way my sincere and honest opinion about the products, I will try to share my best possible criticizing about the good or bad characteristics i find after i tested or tried the product my self and I hope my comments can help you to take better and easier decisions in your purchases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 11 years ago I went to Cherokee NC and I went tubing and lost my tube and had to walk bare foot through a slippery rock bed. While doing so, I slipped and landed directly on my tailbone which split it. I was told by my doctors that there was nothing to do, basically to sit on a pillow until it healed. Since then, it basically sticks out like an actual little stubby tail (literally), especially when sitting in a normal chair. To this day, it hurts more than words can explain while sitting in a normal chair. That being said, I’ve been a cushion freak since. I saw this show up and wanted to test it out since I am a Vine reviewer. I expected more to be honest. It’s not awful; it makes sitting in a normal chair more comfortable. It’s just not as thick as I expected, for one, and it’s a little too soft. Don’t get me wrong, I don’t want a solid block of stiff foam. But I wanted something a little more firm that way it didn’t fully flatten out while sitting on it. I’m only 192 pounds and for my height, that’s healthy. So, if you’re near my weight or more, it’ll do the trick, but there are better options out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eases my pain
reviews.reviewText: I've actually been using this for sitting up in bed during Work From Home days-- I was surprised sitting in bed for long periods on my computer (on a mattress) could be so uncomfortable and painful, but this cushion has done a good job relieving the pressure.I have had a history of tailbone issues, I broke it once a long time ago so this cushion is very helpful. If your tailbone gives you trouble, I'd recommend trying out this pillow. It's a comfortable thickness, it's not too thick or too firm like some of the others I've tried that made me feel like I was sitting in a booster seat. I might get another one for the car!
